description:
WINNER PRECENTRAL.NET Best of 2010 Award
+ Pegman Go Home!(after close street view)
+ Remember Zoom Level fixed.
+Donate at least $0.99 and ads will be removed(you enter your email into the help screen and tap the yellow triangle, after your donation has been added)
**IF YOU DONATED GO TO THE HELP SCREEN ENTER YOUR EMAIL ADDRESS AND ADS WILL BE REMOVED!!!! --WILL BE CLEANING IT UP SOME MORE AND ADDING BONUS! :-)**
+ Added BFZoom(No more missing zoom buttons)
+NOTE(There is a few hour delay between donation and me adding to the database sometimes) 
+fixed issue Google broke/changed regarding drawn lines for directions
+Improved startup time
+Added a new "BFPegman" 
+Streetview (First to have street view for real) :-) +Awesome 3rd party layer inclusions(Wikipedia, Buzz, 4sq Venues, and more..). 
+Traffic layer(Including Traffic Alerts) 
+Directions 
+Favorites 
+History 
+Local Search 
+Sattelite, Topo, Hybrid, street layers for the map. 

BFGMaps strives to be the best maps application for WebOS devices, some features include, street view, favorites, map layer markers, & much more, if you have a suggestion please email me at kernelsandirs@gmail.com
